duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote behavior-based safety policies and procedures to create a safe work environment.
Lead root cause analysis of all safety incidents and empower associates to own safety.
Facilitate and develop effective safety trainings and ensure appropriate PPE utilization.
Record and report all safety incidents appropriately, managing workers’ compensation and restricted duty assignments.
Develop and deliver safety trainings, resolve safety incidents, and remain current on safety standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Occupational Health and Safety or similar field preferred (Master's preferred)
1+ years of experience in a safety role in manufacturing environment desired (Previous internships a plus)
